error.mqtt: Sorry, there was a communication error with the Snips platform.
error.config: Sorry, there was an error with your config file.
error.locale: Sorry, there was an error with your language settings.
error.intentNotRecognized: Sorry, I did not understand your request.

createAlarm: Would you like to create one?
name: How should I name this alarm?
time: When should I set this alarm for?
nameAndTime: When should I set this alarm and how should I name it?

alarm_SetFor: Okay, I set an alarm for {{ time }}.
alarm_SetFor_Name: Okay, an alarm named {{ name }} is set for {{ time }}.

ask.ifListRestAlarms: Would you like to list all the remaining alarms?

head.noAlarmFound: It seems like you have no alarm set for the moment.
head.noSuchAlarmsFound: It seems like you have no such alarm set for the moment.
head.found_AlarmsNamed_: I found {{ number }} alarm{{odd}} named {{ name }}.
head.found_AlarmsSetFor_: I found {{ number }} alarm{{odd}} set for {{ time }}.
head.found_AlarmsSetForEvery_: I found {{ number }} alarm{{odd}} set for each {{ recurrence }}.
head.found_AlarmsNamed_AndSetFor_: I found {{ number }} alarm{{odd}} named {{ name }} set for {{ time }}.
head.found_AlarmsNamed_AndSetForEvery_: I found {{ number }} alarm{{odd}} named {{ name }} set for each {{ recurrence }}.

list.alarm_SetFor_Name_AndRecurrence: An alarm named {{ name }} is set for {{ time }} {{ recurrence }}.
list.alarm_SetFor_Name: An alarm named {{ name }} is set for {{ time }}.
